thread.section_title: The Natural Sapphire Company Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of The Natural Sapphire Company | www.thenaturalsapphirecompany.com
thread.title: Tessa Mathew
thread.title_full: The Natural Sapphire Company reviewed by Tessa Mathew

author: Tessa Mathew
title: Tessa Mathew
text: Working with the staff of the NSC has been a great customer service experience: response time was always within 24 hours, usually less; the staff was friendly and knowledgeable and able to help in the process of choosing a setting and stone; the digital modelling was helpful in getting a better sense of the piece, which is usually more difficult to do online. The finished product is lovely, I am very happy with it. Thank you to you all!
